entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
